content: hook us g6 4 00 mm ● yarn needle ● scissors ● optional pins stitch markers stitches & abbreviations ● chain = chain 22 ● single_crochet = single_crochet ● double_crochet = double_crochet ● treble_crochet = triple crochet ● increase = 2 single_crochet in same stitch ● double_crochet increase = 2 double_crochet in same stitch ● decrease = single_crochet 2 together ● slip_stitch = slip_stitch ● fo = fasten_off special stitches 3-stitch decrease insert hook into first st yo pull up a loop 2 loops skip next st insert into third st yo pull up loop 3 loops yo pull through all 3 running stitch use to sew appliqués bring needle through motif and background one stitch forward at a time gauge 15 single_crochet x 15 row = 4 finished size ~13 5 long x 12 wide pattern notes ● appliqués are made separately and sewn onto a background of your choice ● background panel instructions are included 23 ● color and layout can be customized ● blocking improves flatness ● turning chains do not count as stitches ● you may sell finished items with credit to starrywhisperweaves do not sell or distribute this pattern pattern cups make 2 1 in color c 1 in color d cup body row 1
